name: CR4CK!
description:
Synopsis

The year is 2182 and the people of Earth are in the midst of a battle against 'The AI Robots'. 

You've been captured by the robots and placed in a cell ready for recycling, but they didn't detect your resonant implant!

Use your implant to resonate with the latch into the correct position:

  • Select the block to move with the arrow keys
  • Rotate the blocks with Z (anti-clockwise) and X (clockwise) on a keyboard

NOTE: The mobile web version use an O and an X button.

Features
  • Uses the PICO-8 fantasy console
  • Easy to learn
  • Simple and fun!
Future / Donations

Any donations for this game will inspire me to continue development...

$2 Goal - Game Enhancements

  • Tally of your average scores over the past 10 and 5 games
  • Difficulty selection
  • Randomised code instead of a fixed code
  • Add some title music

$5 Goal - Expert Mode

  • Adds everything from the $2 goal!
  • Include your average scores over the past 25 games
  • Expert mode: you have a limited time or moves to solve the puzzle

$10 Goal - Boss Mode and Run As a Desktop App

  • Everything from the $2 goal!
  • Everything from the $5 goal!
  • Boss mode: the code will randomly change when you take to long
  • Runs as a desktop app!
  • Super randomised code: each block has different colours!
